subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Martin Kaymer and Jarmo Sandelin shared the third-round lead after another wet and windy day at the Alfred Dunhill Links Championship in St. Andrews, Scotland. Kaymer had two birdies for a one-over-par 73 to take the lead at six-under 210. Sandelin later caught him with a 72. Magnus Carlsson (73) was a stroke behind the leaders, and Padraig Harrington (74) was two back.
